BR.name: Zero Escape: Virtue's Last Reward
BR.description: Zero Escape: Virtue's Last Reward é uma sequela ao Zero Escape: Nine Hours, Nine Persons, Nine Doors. Após a sequestração, o Sigma desperta em um elevador com uma menina nomeada Phi. Aprendem logo que, junto com sete outro, estão a ponto de jogar o Nonary Game: Ambidex Edition. Cada participante é equipado com um bracelete que os mate se quebram as regras. Controlado por um coelho misterioso nomeado Zero III, o Nonary Game forçará seus jogadores a decidir quem à confiança e quem a trair. Se podem resolver uma série de enigmas difíceis, a seguir talvez podem descobrir o mistério atrás de Zero III.

CA.name: Zero Escape: Virtue's Last Reward
CA.description: Nominated for Best Story at the 2013 GDC Awards and named IGN’s Best 3DS/DS Story of 2012, Zero Escape: Virtue’s Last Reward is a thrilling visual novel and spiritual sequel to the critically-acclaimed hit, Zero Escape: Nine Hours, Nine Persons, Nine Doors, also known as 999. After being kidnapped by a masked figure, Sigma awakens in an elevator with a girl named Phi. They soon learn that they, along with seven others, are about to play a game of life and death—The Nonary Game: Ambidex Edition. Each participant is equipped with a bracelet that will kill them if they break the rules. Controlled by a mysterious rabbit named Zero III, the Nonary Game will force its players to decide who to trust and who to betray. If they can solve a series of fiendishly difficult puzzles, then perhaps they can uncover the mystery behind Zero III. Sigma will need all his wits to survive and escape alive, but who can he trust and who must he betray?

MX.name: Zero Escape: Virtue's Last Reward
MX.description: Zero Escape: Virtue's Last Reward es una consecuencia al Zero Escape: Nine Hours, Nine Persons, Nine Doors. Después de ser secuestrado, la sigma despierta en un elevador con una muchacha nombrada Phi. Pronto aprenden que, junto con siete otros, están a punto de jugar al Nonary Game: Ambidex Edition. Equipan a cada participante de una pulsera que les mate si rompen las reglas. Controlado por un conejo misterioso nombrado Zero III, el Nonary Game forzará a sus jugadores a decidir a quién a la confianza y quién a traicionar. Si pueden solucionar una serie de rompecabezas difíciles, después quizás pueden destapar el misterio detrás de Zero III.

After being kidnapped by a masked figure, Sigma awakens in an elevator with a girl named Phi.
